text: The 1991–92 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky University during the 1991–92 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by coach Ralph WillardRalph Willard Louisville Assistant Coach Biography, retrieved 14 July 2020 and All- Sun Belt Conference player Jack Jennings.2016-17 SBC Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 28 April 2020 The team received a bid to the 1992 National Invitation Tournament.2019-2020 WKU Basketball Media Guide retrieved 21 April 2020Ralph Willard Holy Cross Head Coach Biography, retrieved 14 July 2020 ==Schedule== 1991-92 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers Schedule and Results, Sports Reference, retrieved 1 May 2020 |- !colspan=6| Regular Season |- |- !colspan=6| 1992 Sun Belt Conference Men's Basketball Tournament |- !colspan=6| 1992 National Invitation Tournament ==References== Western Kentucky Category:Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball seasons Western Kentucky Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's
title: 1991–92 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball team
